channel.title: Shoreditch on Partially Attended
channel.description: Recent content in Shoreditch on Partially Attended

item.title: Hidden In Plain Sight
item.description: I was bouldering yesterday. At my local block - a lump of granite embedded in the middle of shore ditch park. I’ve been climbing on this block pretty much since the week it was put in place. Yesterday I saw that a hold I’d never noticed had been chalked up. It’s a great hold, at about shoulder height. It fits that pads of two and a half fingers, and in spite of being quite small, it feels pretty positive.
